hero.tagline: Curating digital experience and conveying digital solutions for brighter future.

about.title: About Almawa Services
about.subtitle: Empowering Businesses Through Innovation
about.description: At Almawa Services, we are dedicated to transforming businesses through cutting-edge solutions, strategic consulting, and unwavering commitment to excellence.
about.mainDescription: Through our work, we strive to not only support businesses but to empower them to lead, adapt, and thrive in a competitive world. At AL-Mawa International, we don't just provide services we deliver transformation and we promise evolution.
about.teamDescription: Driven by innovation and teamwork, our experts from IT, digital marketing, and graphics departments work hand in hand to create impactful digital experiences. We focus on delivering quality, creativity, and performance in every project we handle.
about.wayWeWorkDescription: At AL-Mawa International, we believe in combining precision with creativity to deliver solutions that truly make a difference. Our approach is collaborative, transparent, and result-oriented ensuring every project aligns perfectly with client goals. We adapt quickly, innovate constantly, and communicate clearly at every stage of execution. From concept to completion, our teams work seamlessly to turn ideas into digital realities that inspire trust and growth. Efficiency, agility, and innovation are not just methods, they're our mindset.
about.whyChooseUsDescription: Choosing AL-Mawa International means partnering with a team that prioritizes your success as much as its own. We bring together technology, strategy, and creativity to craft solutions that deliver measurable results. Our commitment goes beyond service we build lasting partnerships rooted in integrity and excellence. Every solution is tailored, every deadline is respected, and every outcome is designed to empower your digital journey. We don't just meet expectations, we redefine them.
about.whatWeStandForDescription: We stand for innovation, accountability, and transformation values that guide every decision we make. Our goal is to create technology that simplifies lives and accelerates growth. We believe in empowering businesses with digital solutions that are sustainable, smart, and scalable. At our core lies a commitment to honesty, collaboration, and continuous improvement. We're focused on building a better digital experience one that connects people, ideas, and possibilities.

footer.description: Delivering next-generation digital solutions that transform ideas into measurable results.

home.companyDescription: At AL-MAWA International, We see technology not just as a set of tools, but as a bridge that empowers people and accelerates growth. As your digital growth partner, we combine innovation, strategy, and cutting-edge solutions to help businesses thrive in a fast-evolving world.
home.ourMissionDescription: Inspired by the belief that technology's true power lies in people, We're committed to redefining the digital experience through smart, seamless, and sustainable IT solutions. Our mission is to fuse creativity with technology, empowering every client to innovate boldly, perform efficiently, and lead confidently in this evolving digital world.
home.ourValuesDescription: We envision becoming a global symbol of trust, innovation, and transformation a place where ideas turn into lasting impact, and technology serves as a catalyst for human progress, aspiring to create a future where every business, regardless of size, thrives through intelligent innovation, empowered teams, and limitless possibilities.
home.voicesSubtitle: Professional perspectives designed to inform, inspire, and empower

benefits.title: why work with us
benefits.subtitle: We believe in taking care of our team with comprehensive benefits and perks

innovative.title: Innovative Work Environment
innovative.description: Collaborate with a forward-thinking team that embraces creativity, technology, and continuous learning.

growth.title: Career Growth & Development
growth.description: Access opportunities for skill enhancement, mentorship, and advancement in a fast-evolving digital landscape

empowerment.title: Empowerment & Impact
empowerment.description: Contribute to meaningful projects that drive real business results and make a tangible difference

interview.question: What is the interview process like?
interview.answer: Our interview process typically consists of an initial phone screening, technical assessment (for technical roles), and 2-3 rounds of interviews with team members and leadership. The entire process usually takes 2 to 4 days.

remote.question: Do you offer remote work opportunities?
remote.answer: Yes! We offer fully remote positions as well as hybrid arrangements. Many of our team members work remotely, and we have the tools and culture to support distributed teams effectively.

benefits.question: What benefits do you provide?
benefits.answer: We believe in helping our team grow through continuous learning. We offer opportunities to explore new skills, gain hands-on experience, and enhance your expertise all while providing a competitive salary, dedicated training hours for learning new skills, and refreshing tea breaks to keep you energized throughout the day.

careerGrowth.question: How do you support career growth?
careerGrowth.answer: We believe in investing in our people. We provide mentorship programs, conference attendance, internal mobility opportunities, and regular career development conversations.

culture.question: What is the company culture like?
culture.answer: Our culture is built on collaboration, innovation, and respect. We value diverse perspectives, encourage open communication, and maintain a healthy work-life balance while building amazing products.

testimonialsPage.label: ਸਾਖੀਆਂ ਅਤੇ ਕੇਸ ਅਧਿਐਨ
testimonialsPage.title: ਸਾਡੇ ਕਲਾਇੰਟ ਕੀ ਕਹਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ
testimonialsPage.description: ਬ੍ਰਾਂਡਾਂ ਦੀ ਇੱਕ ਚੁਣੀ ਗਈ ਲਾਈਨ ਜੋ AL-MAWA International ਨੂੰ ਭਰੋਸਾ ਕਰਦੀ ਹੈ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਡਿਜੀਟਲ ਮੌਜੂਦਗੀ ਨੂੰ ਆਕਾਰ ਦੇਣ ਲਈ – ਉਚ੍ਚ-ਪ੍ਰਦਰਸ਼ਨ ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ ਕੈਂਪੇਨਿਆਂ ਤੋਂ ਪ੍ਰੀਮੀਅਮ, ਰੂਪਾਂਤਰਨ-ਕੇਂਦ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੈਬਸਾਈਟਾਂ ਤਕ।

reviewsSection.title: ਗਾਹਕ ਸਮੀਖਿਆਵਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਫੀਡਬੈਕ
reviewsSection.subtitle: ਸਾਡੇ ਸੰਤੁਸ਼ਟ ਗਾਹਕਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਸਿਧਾ ਸੁਣੋ ਕਿ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਕੰਮ ਕਰਨ ਦੀ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ।

ourWorkPage.title: ਸਾਡਾ
ourWorkPage.description: ਸਾਡੇ ਡਿਜੀਟਲ ਹੱਲ ਅਤੇ ਮਾਰਕੀਟਿੰਗ ਮੁਹਿੰਮਾਂ ਦੇ ਪੋਰਟਫੋਲੀਓ ਦੀ ਖੋਜ ਕਰੋ ਜੋ ਸਾਡੇ ਗ੍ਰਾਹਕਾਂ ਲਈ ਅਸਲ ਨਤੀਜੇ ਦਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ।

socialMediaSection.title: ਸਾਡਾ ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ ਕੰਮ
socialMediaSection.description: ਲੁਭਾਉਣਾ ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ ਸਮੱਗਰੀ ਜੋ ਸਪਸ਼ਟਤਾ ਅਤੇ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵ ਨਾਲ ਤੁਹਾਡੀ ਬ੍ਰਾਂਡ ਨੁਮਾਇੰਦਗੀ ਲਈ ਡਿਜ਼ਾਈਨ ਕੀਤੀ ਗਈ ਹੈ।

websiteSection.title: ਸਾਡੀ ਵੈਬਸਾਈਟ ਵਿਕਾਸ
websiteSection.description: ਕਸਟਮ ਵੈਬਸਾਈਟ ਹੱਲ ਨਤੀਜੇ ਦੇਣ ਅਤੇ ਦੀਰਘਕਾਲੀਨ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵ ਤਿਆਰ ਕਰਨ ਲਈ ਡਿਜ਼ਾਈਨ ਕੀਤੇ ਗਏ ਹਨ।

shareFeedbackPage.label: ਆਪਣਾ ਅਨੁਭਵ ਸਾਂਝਾ ਕਰੋ
shareFeedbackPage.title: ਡਾਇਰੈਕਟਰ ਦਾ ਡੈਸਕ
shareFeedbackPage.description: ਤੁਹਾਡੀ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਕ੍ਰਿਆ ਮਾਇਨੇ ਰਖਦੀ ਹੈ। ਸਾਡੇ ਨਾਲ ਆਪਣਾ ਅਨੁਭਵ ਸਾਂਝਾ ਕਰੋ ਅਤੇ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਬਿਹਤਰ ਹੋਣ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਹਾਇਤਾ ਕਰੋ। ਹਰ ਸੂਝ ਨੂੰ ਸਾਡੀ ਲੀਡਰਸ਼ਿਪ ਟੀਮ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਵਿਅਕਤਿਗਤ ਤੌਰ 'ਤੇ ਸਮੀਖਿਆ ਕੀਤੀ ਜਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ।

benefits.title: ਆਪਣੀ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਕ੍ਰਿਆ ਸਾਂਝੀ ਕਿਉਂ ਕਰੋ?
benefits.intro: AL-MAWA International ਵਿੱਚ, ਤੁਹਾਡੀ ਅਵਾਜ਼ ਸਾਡੀ ਵਿਕਾਸ ਨੂੰ ਚਲਾਉਂਦੀ ਹੈ। ਹਰ ਟਿੱਪਣੀ, ਸੁਝਾਅ ਅਤੇ ਸੂਝ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਬਿਹਤਰ ਸੇਵਾਵਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਅਨੁਭਵ ਪ੍ਰਦਾਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਹਾਇਤਾ ਕਰਦੀ ਹੈ।

items.title: ਸਿਧਾ ਸਮੀਖਿਆ ਕੀਤਾ
items.description: ਤੁਹਾਡੀ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਕ੍ਰਿਆ ਸਾਡੀ ਲੀਡਰਸ਼ਿਪ ਟੀਮ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਵਿਅਕਤਿਗਤ ਤੌਰ 'ਤੇ ਸਮੀਖਿਆ ਕੀਤੀ ਜਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ

items.title: ਸਾਡੀਆਂ ਸੇਵਾਵਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵਿਤ ਕਰੋ
items.description: ਤੁਹਾਡੀ ਸੂਝ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਸਿਧਾ ਬਿਹਤਰ ਹੋਣ ਅਤੇ ਤੁਹਾਨੂੰ ਬਿਹਤਰ ਸੇਵਾ ਦੇਣ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਹਾਇਤਾ ਕਰਦੀ ਹੈ

shareFeedbackPage.errorDescription: ਕਿਰਪਾ ਕਰਕੇ ਆਪਣੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦੀ ਜਾਂਚ ਕਰੋ ਅਤੇ ਦੁਬਾਰਾ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰੋ।
